experience: You and Franklin both know Richard Fendelman and Lea Black
Raise a lot of monies for charities,and one day maybe myself
Painting in the Dark Charity Promotions
Contact us as we try to help as many charity events as possible. If live performance is an option Franklin loves to paint live and the patrons enjoy watching the creative process.

For many years Franklin has been developing the skills of actually painting with luminous light art forms.The 3-d glow in the dark art style has been widely excepted as a fumd raising vehicle for numerous charities worldwide. Painting live gives Franklin his greatest pleasure. To motivate,inspire.heal through visual therapy,reduce stress.induce sleep,inspire pleasent dreams and show all that anyone can make a difference everyday! Is my life's ambition. If you have a cause that I can help I will... A lifetime Artisian,Art Festival Director,Interior and Exterior designer and Picture Framer.

Worked at Mac Fine Art Publishing Company working to assist Park West with the Procurement Restoration Designing of framing and all hands on original artworks for artists represented by Mary Ann Cohen at MAC and for The MAC Fine Art Gallery on Los Olas Blvd.This was a great experience to work for some of the most important people in the art industry and maybe one of the highlights of my career! Also thanks to Nancy Zebrovious Gallery Manager and the MAC FAMILY!

It is my pleasure to recommend Franklin Goldman for a job position.  I have known him for ten years and I’m sure he is able to be a multi-task employee to ensure that all projects are completed in a timely manner.Franklin is very bright, organized, quite motivated, efficient, dedicated, can work independently   and has an excellent rapport with all kinds of people.   I feel confident in saying that he will devote himself to a position with any organization with a high degree of diligence and capable of handling any situation with thoughtfulnessIn summary, I highly recommend Franklin for any position or endeavor that he may seek to pursue. He will be a valuable asset for any organization. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Owner at Scott Jacobs Studio
February 27, 2012, Scott worked with Franklin in the same group

Scott Jacobs is one of the nicest Artist's and gentleman you could ever expect to meet! His nature of treating everyone with the respect that they would deserve as a trusted friend is rare. As far as his technical ability and attention to detail along with his extensive art education skills (teaching level).His  knowledge of art supplies and techniques makes him in my professional opinion the most talented artist at any of the styles he decides to paint.After handling and framing  many of his originals it only takes one painting to notice NO BRUSHSTROKES AT ALL! He airbrushes but that's not the secret. His skill at mixing mediums and using only the best quality brushes and supplies. Along with extreme talent makes him the BEST at what he does. 5 STARS ***** FRANKLIN GOLDMAN

summary: Launched my love of the arts with  Marvin Markman, where we catapulted his career throughcharity art promotions with his own unique innovative concepts. Franklin has since become President of an art promotion company and organized several artfestivals and events. He also assisted many other prominent local and successful artistsin his efforts to promote the arts through charitable and worthwhile causes. Artist Statement:While working as a gallery operator and picture framer, I have gained a tremendous senseof color and color coordination, as well as extensive artistic design. I have also seenand experienced a variety of art in every possible medium. Many trends have come and gone,but I feel the truly important artists change with the time, definitely not the trends.They develop new concepts in their minds and express it in their art. Ultimately, I want to become a true inspiration to young artists who feel they have obstacles to overcome, which create a lack of confidence in their artistic ability. I wantto encourage them to express their creativity and to prosper with my sponsorship andacknowledgement. Franklin Goldman's paintings are in several corporate and private collections Worldwide in Florida,New York and Hawaii. Home is where the art is!
name: Franklin Goldman
title: Artist/Owner/Philanthropist at Painting in the Dark Charity Promotions
